üî´ Free Raid Boss : Bloomreaper the Invincible üî´
Dropped/Dropps : December 11, 2025
descriptionText:
üÜï ICYMI : Bloomreaper is a brand-new raid boss coming to Borderlands 4. Alongside it, there will also be a UVHM (Ultimate Vault Hunter Mode) increase, bringing a new challenge for players to dive into.

Bloomreaper :
  • invincibles: If you are familiar with 'invincibles' from the older games in the series, this will certainly ring a bell.
  • will be the first endgame raid boss in Borderlands 4. While the name invincible may seem impossible to kill, know that they will be killable, but not easy. Here's what you can expect:
    - Massive Health Pools
    - Extremely Lethal Attack Damage
    - New Modifiers

Tips For Fighting : Bloomreaper :
  • Vile: Splash Damage
  • Flesh: Incendairy Damage

Drops From Bloomreaper : 5 dedicated legendary items
  • Will Update: Once I see whats dropping, So please give me a few :
    Mantra :

buttonText:
‚ùÑÔ∏èHow Rush Saved Mercenary Day‚ùÑÔ∏è
Bounty Pack 1 | Dropped : November 20, 2025
descriptionText:
üÜï ICYMI : Anyone who purchased the Deluxe Edition, Super Deluxe Edition, or Bounty Pack Bundle will receive a new, fifth Bounty Pack in 2026 at no additional cost.

Type Of Content : Paid DLC Given Free |Will update as more info,images come out

Narrative content :
  • Story: Players help Rush organize a 'Mercenary Day' celebration on Chyros, which is opposed by Minister Screw, the holiday-hating Minister of Culture.
  • Content: Includes new main missions, enemies, and legendary loot.

Vault Card rewards :
  • Vault Card: A permanent, non-expiring card that provides rewards through completing daily and weekly challenges..
  • Loot: 24 cosmetics to unlock and four pieces of rerollable gear
    4 re-rollable weapons
    4 Vault Hunter Heads
    4 Vault Hunter Skins
    5 Weapon Skins
    5 Vehicle Skins
    4 ECHO-4 Drone Skins
    2 ECHO-4 Attachments

Other earnable content :
  • DigiRunner: A new vehicle for the in-game mode.
  • Vault Hunter Skin: A new cosmetic skin for a Vault Hunter.
  • ECHO-4 Skin: A new cosmetic skin for the ECHO-4 drone.
